belongs_to_collection.name: Dark Night of the Scarecrow Collection

overview: Bubba, an intellectually disabled man, is falsely accused of attacking a young girl. Disguised as a scarecrow, he hides in a cornfield, only to be hunted down and shot by four vigilante men. After they are acquitted due to lack of evidence, the men find themselves being stalked one by one.
title: Dark Night of the Scarecrow
